education_excellence: High school education excellence we are happy to connect with you in whatever way you are most comfortable
start_courses_description: Welcome to the beginning of the 2025 academic year at Collège international le pieux. We're excited to start our courses and begin a journey of learning, growth, and success together.

choose_section.heading: Why choose Collège international le pieux?

card1.title: Education Excellence
card1.description: We offer the best education to our students, ensuring they have access to a diverse range of learning resources and opportunities.

courses.title: Veterinary and Agronomy
courses.description: Would you like to build your career in Veterinary and Agronomy? This course explores veterinary science and agronomy, covering topics such as animal health, nutrition, breeding, crop production, and soil management.

courses.title: Construction
courses.description: Would you like to build your career in construction? This course covers the principles and techniques of construction, including building materials, structural systems, construction methods, and project management.

courses.title: Mechanical
courses.description: Build your future career in Mechanical. This course covers principles of mechanics, including statics, dynamics, kinematics, and mechanical systems, and their applications in engineering and technology.

courses.title: General electricity
courses.description: This course covers fundamental principles and applications of general electricity, including circuits, voltage, current, resistance, and power.

courses.title: Sales and Management
courses.description: This course focuses on commercial and management skills, including marketing, sales, finance, human resources, and business operations.

courses.title: cut and seam
courses.description: would you like to transform your passion in cut and seam? this is the best course for you in which you will be learning many things like art,seam etc

footer.main_address: Main Address - Congo Drc. Kalemie 540 Street

scienceFair.title: Science Fair Competition
scienceFair.description: Join us for an exciting science fair competition showcasing the innovative projects of our high school students.

sportsDay.title: Annual Sports Day
sportsDay.description: Get ready for a day filled with fun and athleticism at our annual sports day event. Cheer for your favorite teams!

mathCompetition.title: Math Competition
mathCompetition.description: Participate in our Math competition to test and showcase your mathematical skills.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Collège international Lepieux is a leading secondary educational institution located in the city of Kalemie, Democratic Republic of Congo, dedicated to providing high-quality technical education to students. Our institute aims to equip students with the skills and knowledge to excel in various technical fields, promoting personal and professional growth. We offer a comprehensive curriculum, state-of-the-art facilities, and a supportive learning environment to ensure our students receive the best education possible.
about.studyDescription1: Discover the rich tapestry of learning experiences waiting for you within our institution.
about.studyDescription2: Experience the transformative power of expert-led education, shaping minds and futures.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: If you would like to get updates on our events and stay in contact with us, please don't hesitate. Just reach out to us; we are here to help you.

shortcourses.title: Networking and telecomunication
shortcourses.description: Discover networking essentials in this 6-month course covering architecture, protocols, and communication systems.

shortcourses.title: cut and seam
shortcourses.description: For a hands-on experience, enroll in our 6-month 'Cut and Seam' course. Learn the art of precision cutting and expert seam techniques.

shortcourses.title: Adjustment and welding
shortcourses.description: Join our 6-month 'Adjustment and Welding' course to master construction principles and techniques. Explore building materials, structural systems, construction methods, and project management essentials.

shortcourses.title: Adult rehabilitation school
shortcourses.description: Embark on a 6-month journey at our Adult Rehabilitation School. Gain expertise in commercial and management skills, covering marketing, sales, finance, human resources, and business operations

shortcourses.title: Domestic and industrial installation
shortcourses.description: Explore mechanics in our 6-month 'Domestic and Industrial Installation' course. Learn statics, dynamics, kinematics, and mechanical systems, applied in engineering and technology

shortcourses.title: Masonary and plumbing
shortcourses.description: Enroll in our 6-month 'Masonry and Plumbing' course, diving into the essentials of construction and water systems. Learn masonry techniques alongside plumbing principles, preparing you for diverse projects in the field.

short.title: our short courses
short.description: We offer a range of short courses in various fields each spanning approximately six months and conducted through in-person construction

school.title: School Curriculum
school.description: Explore our comprehensive school curriculum designed to provide a high-quality and diversified education. Our curriculum emphasizes critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and creativity to prepare students for success in an ever-changing world.

school1.title: School Curriculum
school1.description: Our school offers a diverse range of courses designed to meet the educational needs of students. Whether you're interested in our courses which we offer to our students, we have a program tailored for you. Our experienced options ensure a high-quality education that prepares students for their future careers.

school2.title: School Fees Structure
school2.description: Thank you for reaching out to us. We appreciate your interest at Collège international le pieux. We understand the importance of transparency and clarity in financial matters. Rest assured, we have prepared a comprehensive fees structure and payment information document that outlines all the necessary details for our students. Please find attached the fees structure and payment information for your reference. Should you have any questions or require further clarification, feel free to contact our admissions.Just reach out to us for more information.

first.title: Build your future with the first secondary engineering school in the DRC

lieu.title: Our mission is to train the Congolese innovators of tomorrow by providing excellent education in the fields of science and technology

change.title: Changing the world starts here: at Lepieux, I learn to solve real-world problems and build the future of my country.

cursus.title: Our six-year curriculum combines theory and practice to prepare students for the challenges of tomorrow

localisation.title: Our institution, located in Kalemie, offers a modern safe, and supervised environment that fosters student growth and success. It features high-quality infrastructure,including a computer lab equipped to accommodate up to 50 students at once, as well as electronics and electricity labs that promote hands-on learning and innovation from secondary school onward.

dom.desc: Hands-on training in electrical installation and maintenance

physic.desc: Comprehensive programs to master fundamental sciences.

nomy.desc: Training in sustainable agricultural techniques and crop management.

program.description: The program consists of six groups of options

desc.title: Teachers organize the curriculum with special attention to the development of the following elements.

context.title: Teaching and Learning in Context
context.description: — Students learn best when their learning experiences take place in a context and are connected to their lives and the world around them. Through global contexts, students explore human identity, global challenges, and what it means to be sensitive to international realities.

action.title: Service as Action (Community Service)
action.description: — Action (learning by doing and experiencing) and service are values we want to instill in young people. Learners take action by applying what they have learned in the classroom and beyond. They strive to be selfless members of the community by engaging in mutual aid and working to improve the lives of others and the state of the environment. Service as action is an integral part of the program, especially within the framework of the KIS community project.

understanding.title: Conceptual Understanding
understanding.description: — Concepts are big ideas that are relevant within specific disciplines and in an interdisciplinary manner. Students use concepts as a vehicle to explore important questions and ideas on a personal, local, and global level, and to examine knowledge holistically.

identity.title: Language and Identity
identity.description: — Students must learn at least French and English as well as have basic knowledge of Kiswahili. Learning to communicate in different ways is essential for developing intercultural understanding and crucial for shaping one's identity.

approaches.title: Approaches to Learning
approaches.description: — A key element across all subject groups in our curriculum, approaches to learning provide the foundation for independent learning and encourage students to apply their knowledge and skills in new contexts. The development and application of these skills help students learn how to learn.
